contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "treat me fairly" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublenegatives]])
contextId.glQuote: let there be no injustice with you

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be reworded with only one of the negatives. Alternate translation: "He devoured everything, and there is nothing left" or "There is nothing left because he devoured everything" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublenegatives]])
contextId.glQuote: There is nothing left that he did not devour
